org.terrier.structures
Class CompressingMetaIndex

java.lang.Object
  org.terrier.structures.CompressingMetaIndex
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, MetaIndex
public class CompressingMetaIndex
extends Object
implements MetaIndex

A MetaIndex implementation. Values have maximum lengths, but overall value blobs are compressed using zip.Inflater.

Since:
3.0
Author:
Craig Macdonald & Vassilis Plachouras
